metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20200 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** CertificatePinner.java in OkHttp 3.x through 3.12.0 allowsman-in-the-middle attackers to bypass certificate pinning by changingSSLContext and the boolean values while hooking the application. NOTE: Thisid is disputed because some parties don't consider this is a vulnerability.Their rationale can be found inhttps://github.com/square/okhttp/issues/4967.

criterions.comment: libokhttp-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
